description: This file contains code for generating C++ source code for JSON-RPC communication, including functions to emit events, register/unregister RPC methods and notifications, and handle versioning and namespace management. It appears to be part of a code generation tool that reads schema definitions and produces server-side stub implementations.

classes.name: AppendTest
classes.description: A class or function used within the code generation process, likely for appending tests or conditions during code emission.

methods.name: EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False)
methods.description: Generates C++ code for emitting a JSON-RPC event based on an event object and parameters, including definitions for the function signature and implementation for notifying listeners.

methods.name: _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])
methods.description: Generates the prologue code for the RPC source file, including includes, namespace definitions, and initial setup for code emission.

methods.name: _EmitRpcEpilogue(root, emit, ns)
methods.description: Generates the epilogue code for the RPC source file, closing namespaces and finalizing the generated code structure.

methods.name: _EmitVersionCode(emit, version)
methods.description: Emits C++ namespace constants defining the version of the RPC interface.

methods.name: _EmitRpcCode(root, emit, ns, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Main function for generating the entire RPC source code, including registration functions, method and event definitions, and versioning, using an emitter object.

methods.name: EmitRpcCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Public interface that wraps _EmitRpcCode and handles setup for namespace and header/source inclusion, emitting complete RPC code.

methods.name: EmitRpcVersionCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Emits version-related code and namespace setup for the RPC interface.

methods.name: _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")

ctags.name: EmitEvent
ctags.pattern: /^def EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False):$/

ctags.name: _EmitRpcPrologue
ctags.pattern: /^def _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = []):$/
ctags.signature: (root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])

ctags.name: _Invoke
ctags.pattern: /^            def _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", re/
ctags.signature: (params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")
